archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0973
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Billing Specialist, I require the flexibility to apply/amend/remove a one-off charges/credits against 1 or many accounts in bulk and include either a backdated date or a future date. In the event of a future date the one-off charge should not bill until the date is reached aso that we can onbill any charges that come via various external billing sources (e.g. ERemedy, known fixed billing amounts)

properties.value: Which currency should be presented during selling process? Horizon 2 requirement. Requirement need to be discussed in dedicated workshop session

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
